website_summaries.verdict: It has some nice design features like its size and shape, but others on our list are more cost-effective.
pros: A large makeup applicator with a rounded end, edgeless design, and soft texture that's perfect for smoothing out makeup for line-free blending
cons: Only get one for the price
Tends to soak up a lot of liquid makeup
Leaves black specks behind when it starts to wear out

customer_reviews.title: Beauty blender dup
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I'm a makeup artist and I have tried many beauty sponges but this right here is the exact dupe of the beauty blender for half the price. I'm glad one of my clients introduced me to this sponge from now on this will be the only one I will buy!!! Xoxo @dashofglam_mua
customer_reviews.author: Alex  DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item maybe a year ago and decided to get another one since it was a great dupe for beauty blender. What I received is not the same shape or material as the first one. This new product is not as soft and too round. The original is on the right and the new one is on the left
customer_reviews.author: Karen N

customer_reviews.title: Only think I liked was it was soft
customer_reviews.text: Only think I liked was it was soft. BUT even after cleaning it and trying again, it continues to leave tiny black specks stuck in my foundations. Its just AWFUL. I am surprised because I have loved other products from Aeshetica and I am VERY disappointed. I have used about 8 other kinds of blending sponges and NONE of the others left specks like this. I am considering sending it back, I have to see how much I wasted on this product that will just go in the trash =(
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inman

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to a Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews thinking the sponge would some what be similar to the authentic Beauty Blender but boy was I wrong. The Beauty Blender has a very soft feel and when you press on it it takes a while to form back up. This sponge is a lot more dense and hard and once you squish it it instantly forms up. The feel is nothin close to the Beauty Blender. The size is also far too large. It's a little overwhelming on the face. It is okay at applying makeup but is most definitely not a good dupe to the Beauty Blender. Left is Beauty Blender, right is aesthetica sponge
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this blender due to the negative reviews. However, I'm glad I went with my instinct and purchased. I figured if it didn't work out, I wouldn't be out of much money. I honestly love this blender. It's soft despite many reviews stating otherwise. It's perfect if you are going for minimum coverage or want to build on your foundation. If you want straight full coverage, I would recommend using a blending brush vs sponge. Don't get me wrong, you can obtain full coverage with this but it would have to be built up, which is my preference. I like to control the amount of foundation applied.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as my Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I have had multiple other sponges from MAC, Beauty Blender and other companies. I think some of them are absolutely ridiculously priced as I tend to just lose them (don't ask me where they go as it's a mystery). Decided to just try a cheaper one this time and it's absolutely perfect for applying my foundation, blending my contour etc. Just need to buy another one so one can be 'in the wash' whilst the other is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Russell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the dupe I really like for beauty blenders I usually buy called "zenda" was out of stock on Amazon. Don't even bother buying this, first time washing it (gently) it tore in 2-3 places so I just threw it away. The sponge itself is super dense and feels nothing like a beauty blender. Like I said, if you want a good beauty sponge for a good price just buy the brand Zenda.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good sponge
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. The surface is so smooth and blends makeup perfectly. It’s significantly smaller and denser than most beauty sponges, to the point that it gets comically large when it soaks up water. I like this though, because it seems to only soak up water, and is too dense to fully absorb thicker liquids like foundation. Soo many sponges are wasteful and just eat foundation, but not this one. The foundation sits on the surface of the sponge without being totally absorbed by it. I’m very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: This is great if you're looking for something between the really expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you're looking for something between the really expensive beauty blenders and the really cheap dollar store sponges. It expands to about 2x when dampened and blends well. The black color makes it really easy to see when it needs to be thoroughly cleaned. Although I'm not there yet, I expect the color will also make it easier to tell when it's time to replace it all together. After I had cleaned it a few times it started to show a small amount of wear, but it's hardly noticeable. If you want a quality item for less than half the price of a beauty blender, this product is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great Reusable Cosmetic Sponge!
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered as described, packaged well, and ahead of anticipated time. The sponge is well made and easy to blend my "3": highlighter, contour, blush, etc. It's washable and assists in prevention of less expensive white wedge sponges that will add to pollution/plastics environmental issue. I bought three as I like to have one for each of my "3". It's easy to turn to side if you want just one. It dries quickly after simple soapy wash. The price is inexpensive for product. The sellers were excellent in checking with me to see how my purchase was.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used latex sponges most of my life (after using hands as a kid) and I'm very impressed. I vehemently refused to buy a beauty blender because of the price and didnt see why one piece of foam was better than another. I'm very glad I bought this. It smooths my concealer so much better than the latex sponges I've used for years and absorbs so much less product. Plus, it's very cheap. I'm very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Beauty Sponge WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have to honestly say I had never used a sponge to apply my make and wasn’t sure what to expect. I decided to order the Aesthetica Beauty Sponge and it has changed the way I will forever apply my foundation. I just turned 54 and it really makes my skin look smoother and more radiant every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't blend as well as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I think my skin may just be too mature for foundation sponges. I find that a smooth cosmetic wedge works better. This is a high quality product, no question, it just didn't do the job for me. I had a hard time getting my foundation to blend without streaking.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool.......
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blender for about 5 months now. I wanted to wait to leave a review to give time for usage and how it wears. This is a great little tool. I'm over 60 and have worn make-up for years. I really appreciate this applicator as it helps get everything in the right place, especially with wrinkles! :-) I've washed it many times and I honestly do not see how people say it rips or gets holes in it. Maybe they've poked a long fingernail in it! I don't know, but mine looks as good today as when I first purchased it. It's soft, durable, and for the money, you really can't go wrong. Great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This sponge is amazing. It blows all other beauty sponges I have tried out of the water, even my beloved beauty blender. I have bought so many cheap/drug store sponges and they never really lived up to the Beauty Blender. The closest I found was the orange Real Techniques sponge but I was never really committed to it. I would still reach for my beauty blenders most of the time. UNTIL NOW. This sponge changed the game. I wish it was just a little bit smaller but other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for quite a few weeks now, and I have had no problems. It’s very soft and easy to clean. I was skeptical because I saw seen reviews saying it ripped within a couple days but I have not had that problem. You can find the same type of beauty blender at Ulta for $20 so this is definitely a good purchase. Also it only took about three days to come in.Also it only took about three days to come in. When this one gets too old I’ll definitely just re-purchase
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, firm blender. I’ve been using it for about a month now and it has held up very nicely. I wash it pretty rough with my face wash after every use and it’s still as good as new. Especially for the price I will definitely be purchasing this again when it’s time to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Totally makes a difference, worth trying out
customer_reviews.text: I had heard from a friend over and over how great this beauty blender was. So after months of just listening to her talk about it, I finally bought one myself. This thing didn’t disappoint. I wasn’t using a beauty blender before because I’d tried the pink one before and it was just okay and I feel like it took more makeup into the sponge than left on my face. With this I can tell what a big difference it made in applying my makeup and really happy that I finally got this!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I hate how high priced all these beauty blender sponges are. My sponge started to break down and leave black specks on my face BUT that’s because when cleaning my sponge, the make up wouldn’t come off so I’d squeeze and squish trying to clean it and i just ended up throwing away my sponge because my makeup refused to come off it. It absorbed a lot of makeup when using. But it is very soft for pouncing on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Kara L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't compare to beautyblender brand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to see if the less expensive products could be just as good as the beauty blender brand, and sadly it was not. This sponge is much more dense than a beauty blender and did not grow as much as a beauty blender does. When I was using it to apply my foundation it did not bounce as nicely as I had hoped, it was not as soft of a bounce as a beauty blender and it did not distribute the makeup as evenly. Not 100% disappointed because I knew when buying it that it may not meet the same standards, but I'll be sticking with my beauty blenders instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SPONGE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SPONGE! I have never used the beauty blender before, and to be honest beforehand I just applied my foundation with my hands (I have used brushes before, but don't like them). The sponge blends your makeup effortlessly. I usually spray some setting spray on beforehand onto the sponge, and then apply the foundation because I find this makes it not only apply better, but set better too. My only complaint is that it does get dirty very easily, but I suppose this would happen with any makeup sponge, just by the nature of it being a makeup sponge. Luckily, it is very easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for expert or beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product! Before this I just applied makeup with fingers, Im a little behind on this whole makeup wearing department. But I can say that this product helps the makeup go on smooth. I use a BB cream that’s a little thick and when Using the tip side I smooth it in. Definitely find it handy, I wash it after every use. And it does double in size when wet.
customer_reviews.author: N J

customer_reviews.title: SMALL & UNSANITARY packaging Smushed!
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than pictured! Received horribly packaged! Not the original size beauty blender I am familiar with; and scared to use because it’s been collecting dust and dirt.. washing it and turned running water into light brown color. Not acceptable for a sponge! Especially one made for my face 🤢👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Braun

customer_reviews.title: Best discount foundation/concealer blender!
customer_reviews.text: WAY better "discount" beauty sponge than many others I have tried! Other sponges, claiming to be Beauty Blender dupes, have been really hard or rubbery and absorb too much product without blending it out to a flawless finish. Other sponges I've tried have also ripped or gotten fingernail marks in them really easily and were hard to clean. I have no complaints about this sponge compared to the others. I use it primarily for foundation and concealer, so I can't speak to how well it blends bronzer, contour powder or blush... but overall I'm very happy with this blender, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love my beauty blender!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beauty blender, it's super soft and blends my concealer in really well. I had an original beauty blender that I fell in love with and it started to fall apart after using it for about a year. I then purchased an ecotools and hated it, it was hard and didn't do a great job with blending. I was afraid to purchase anything other than the original beauty blender but after reading reviews I decided to give this one a chance. I'm really happy that I did. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: btrflyy17

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beauty Blenders!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really enjoyed this blender. I love the Beauty blender brand sponges, however I refuse to pay $25 for a sponge. I’ve tried many dups and nothing ever compared, until I tried this one! I’d go as far to say it’s better than the BB! Although, once it ages a bit, it does get flakey - but that didn’t happen to me until after 4-6 months of use (with cleaning and santitation obviously.) I’ve leaving a review, because I’m back to buy a replacement! My new go to ☝🏼
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch!
customer_reviews.text: Never used an expensive make-up sponge before. But, at the age, I've made the decision--if its the last thing I buy--I'll buy up! Glad I did, as I love this sponge. It feels great on the skin, really distributes make-up well and evenly, cleans up nicely and lasts longer than the cheap ones you buy in bulk. And recommend as a great stocking stuffer, or gift bag item.
customer_reviews.author: DAD

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This beauty blender is literally the GREATEST one I have ever used! I’ve had it for about a month and a half now and still love it so much. It applies my foundation and concealer on sooo smoothly and evenly, and doesn’t move the product around on my face like other beauty blenders do. It is also very soft and feels great on my skin. I would just recommend washing it gently, otherwise you risk making small tears in it, but other than that, it is perfect! I’m planning on buying a bunch more just to stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The best by far!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have tried many, many, many different types of beauty blenders, and I always come back to this one. I love the way it expand when wet. The finish is also flawless. Some of the other beauty blenders with smear or spread my concealer out of place and I hate that. With this beauty blender the makeup stays right where you put it. Its also good for applying powder. I love it !!! I will order the 2 pack next time because I won't be using any other brand from now on..
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best beauty blender I have purchased so far! I have tried all of the drug store brands and beauty blenders own and this one has held up so well! It’s so soft and doesn’t absorb a lot of product. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I wouldn't be able to find a cheaper version of the Beauty Blender but this is just as good as the high priced version! It blends makeup perfectly and is decently durable. I did experience some ripping/tearing near the top of the sponge but I think that's because I squeezed too hard while cleaning. As long as you clean it regularly with a gentle cleaner and take care of this it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little bit firmer than beauty blender but not super dense so it works really well when you’re applying ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is a highly rated dupe for the beauty blender and I’ve had mine for a couple of years now. I’ve washed it a couple times and the color won’t fade. It’s a little bit firmer than beauty blender but not super dense so it works really well when you’re applying your make up. I don’t feel like it soaks up too much of my foundation when I dampen it. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: wvyrv

customer_reviews.title: 💓 It provided a seamless blend, an airbrushed application, & absorbed minimal product 💓
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile beauty sponge. It provided a seamless blend, an airbrushed application, and absorbed minimal product. This performed great for applying foundation, concealer, highlight, setting powder, and more. This is a versatile beauty sponge and I believe it performed just as well as the original Beauty Blender. I have already placed an order for an additional blender, at this price point how can you not? I Highly recommended 😊
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a beauty blender!
customer_reviews.text: Will never waste my money on an expensive beauty blender again. This one is just as good quality as a beauty blender. I like that it's black, so it doesn't appear as dirty as say pink or purple beauty blenders. The only con to using any type of beauty blender sponge, is if you don't clean them frequently, they start developing mold. I haven't noticed any mold growth on mine, but I've been good about cleaning it about once a week. Definitely recommend buying this! Awesome quality to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great finish!
customer_reviews.text: I had a professional make-up consultant recommend this sponge to me. I did not purchase it at that time, but fortunately my daughter gave me one as a gift. I liked it so much I purchased one to have in my travel bag. It is easy to use and it makes such a difference in how my foundation goes on. I would have areas where the foundation would clump up and would appear uneven. I have neither problem with this sponge applicator. I am happy to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: BB Dupe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve have multiple Beauty Blenders and decided I’d try a different brand and try to find a dupe. I was pleasantly surprised when I used this one for the first time. IMO it’s better than a BB. I personally think BB pick up too much foundation, unlike the BB this one didn’t. It’s super easy to clean and gets bigger than a normal BB when wet. The shape when wet is a little different but I didn’t mind. Would recommend 10/10. I did look on their website of the brand and they are more expensive there.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: You can see the product well, cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it. It fits in with the color scheme of my vanity set up. It is soft and doesn't feel like you are slamming a rock into your face. It gives me a really even spread of foundation, you don't have to beat your face as long as with some blenders. Easy to clean, easy to see where the product is on the sponge so you don't waste any, good quality materials
customer_reviews.author: Harper S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the actual beauty blender!
customer_reviews.text: This is my tried and true sponge. I recently bought the actual beauty blender just to see if I was missing out. Nope! I actually like the aesthetica sponge better! It's just slightly firmer, it doesn't soak up as much of my product, and lasts much longer than the $20 original beauty blender. Will keep coming back over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Blends well and doesn't break your bank
customer_reviews.text: It blends out my products seamlessly with no noticeable difference compared to when I was using a Beauty Blender. It is the perfect dupe as it doesn't break your bank! I'm on my fourth one.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Stop spending $20 per sponge!
customer_reviews.text: Stop buying any other sponge!! I'm never buying another sponge again. These feel softer and clean easier than the $20 big names. I buy these 3 and 4 at a time and use them for different things- powder, cream products, foundation, etc. They're so cheap that once they start to stain or show signs of wear and tear, I toss them for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay K.

customer_reviews.title: BB DUPE!
customer_reviews.text: I was never a big fan of beauty blenders, mostly bc of the price tag and I couldn’t tell a definite difference between the sponge and using one of my ole trusty brushes. This sponge is a game changer!! It is so so soft and so easy to clean, I feel like it blends my makeup so evenly without giving me cake face, and the sponge itself doesn’t absorb a whole lot of product (make sure it is damp first)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Only Blender You Need
customer_reviews.text: I would buy 100 of these! Definitely a close Beauty Blender dupe. So incredibly soft, easy to use & easily to clean. The “foam” texture is so much better than all my other blenders and I feel like it doesn’t suck in all my makeup right away as I’m using much less now with this one. For the cost and quality, you can’t go wrong. Buy 1 or 50, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: natsRecs

customer_reviews.title: Not amazed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blender because of all the good reviews. Obviously everyones face is different, because im really not into these. Definitely dont use dry, but even wet theyre really stiff. It doesnt really help me blend my foundation; more like push it around my face. I think the one good thing about it, is that it doesnt absord much of the makeup.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this I thought oh no this is too soft to work well, boy was I wrong. It's now the only blender I use and even though it's small it somehow takes less time to get ready and doesn't absorb much product (liquid foundation in my case) I want to get a few more to put in my purse in case I ever need to touch up my makeup and it's tiny enough to fit!
customer_reviews.author: kahlia reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: A worthy opponent of the beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: This sponge performs quite well. I bought it after being disappointed with my 2nd RT sponge (they must have changed the material). I read a few unfavorable reviews on the Aesthetica sponge but ordered it anyway and was pleasantly surprised. It blends well and doesn't absorb much product. The price point is great too, and is an overall a good value. I also like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Good blender
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty surprised by this. Buzzfeed said that this is a good substitute over the more expensive brand name blender. While I've never tried the much more expensive brand name one, I have tried much much cheaper ones, and this one is certainly better. I'm debating now if I should buy a second one for myself. It doesn't absorb too much product, and it's nice and light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: Zlandox, King of Metal

customer_reviews.title: These really are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this makeup sponge originally because it popped up quick in my search and figured it would basically “get the job done”, it’s a sponge, they’re all alike.. right? Well I LOVED it! BUT, when it was time to replace it I bought a different kind from a different company thinking they’re all the same, but nope.. they are not. I came right back to this one and now have bought 4 since. These will always be in my makeup routine. In my opinion they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks. I really enjoyed it at first. But then for some reason the part of the sponge I use the most often got really hard. Even with thorough washing I can’t get it really soft again. Disappointed it only lasted a month and haven’t had that problem before with other sponges
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day instead of the Beauty Blender because this is cheaper. I have used an actual Beauty Blender before and this is the best "knock off" one I have come across. The material is basically the same. I have used other ones that were hard/too firm or the material would fall apart after use. This one is a great alternative to the actual Beauty Blender.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sponge! The tip is good enough for the under eye. It's soft and does a great job applying foundation. I've used a lot of inexpensive sponges and really preferred the real techniques orange one, but it always ripped on the first or second wash. This hasn't ripped on me and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth PipesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Soft Sponge
customer_reviews.text: This makeup blending sponge is AWESOME, especially for the price. I was hesitant based on other reviews, but for the price i thought what the heck i'll try it. I am so glad I did. This sponge is super soft and squishy. It close to doubles in size when wet, and perfectly blends makeup without absorbing it. Over three months of using it every day it has held up super well and is not breaking apart or leaving black specs behind like other people were having trouble with. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SarahU

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Just used this today! I can only compare it to my ulta beauty sponge. I liked this one a little better as it seemed to provide fuller coverage. It is a little harder and my cc cream doesn't soak into the sponge as much as the ulta one which must be why it provides more coverage. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: Omg yes!
customer_reviews.text: So I was considering buying the original Beauty Blender, thought the $20 price was INSANE. I thought I would give this one a shot before splurging on the Beauty Blender. And DEAR GOD THIS THING IS AMAZING. I didn’t realize how much my makeup wasn’t blended before till I started usingl this. Lol Granted I use mine more for a cream concealer stick than foundation
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: The closest alternative blender to the expensive Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender for my girlfriend after overhearing her watching her favorite IG influencer rave about it. I've been buying her those expensive pink beauty blenders up until now. Apparently this blender is still a tiny bit more dense than the expensive original but it is a very close replacement. If you want to pay a bunch more money for the original Beauty Blender, good for you. If you want/need a much less expensive option that isn't terrible at blending and doesn't fall apart to bits and shreds when you wash/use it then this is the best option for you!
customer_reviews.author: A-Aron

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these by chance because I was shopping around to find a beauty blender i liked. One that wasn't too soft, or too hard, and yes Goldilocks, this one is just right! It's wasy to use and the amount of water you put on it changes the firmness to your desired amout. You can clearly see when it needs cleaning, but it doesn't stain. Best of both worlds. Clearly, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Expect great things
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of foundation brushes. I saw a few YouTube videos who swore by a beauty blender. After many reviews and research I found this gem. I love this thing. I will never use a foundation brush again. It is starting to breakdown after about 3mos after constant washing. I’ll buy another once it’s time
customer_reviews.author: Tonisha

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup sponge I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Don't give in and waste your money on a 20$ name brand sponge that probably costs $1 to produce and is exactly the same as cheaper ones (cough cough), get this bad boy instead. In my experience it's super soft, easy to clean (i just rinse it in cold water for a bit and it comes out with no stains or anything) and blends skin makeup seamlessly. If you're looking for the best bang for your buck this is 100% it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrating
customer_reviews.text: Lighter and less dense than a Beauty Blender that lasted for years. 2 or 3 weeks of use and this is leaving black messes on my face as if its disintegrating. Have to just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Sponge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sponge as my friend recommended it. I am happy I did. The quality is great and it has lasted me quite a while. The sponge is light and fluffy and perfect once it has soaked water and squeezed. I have tried other sponges that were way to hard even after being soaked in water. Once I am done with the sponge, I keep it in my beauty blender sponge holder and it drys perfectly. I will continue to order this beauty sponge and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Burk

customer_reviews.title: Great preformance for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely consider this a dupe for the beauty blender. It blends so smooth and evenly and doesn’t absorb a ton of product. I clean my sponges with baby wash at least every other use, and I find this one does deteriorate quicker than a BB, leaving tiny black dots on my face. I just throw it out once this starts happening. But for the price you really can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kempisty

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I haven’t had this for years - makes a huge difference. Only things are that it soaks up your makeup and seems like it wastes it a bit because you end up washing it out. Also, I’ve had this a few months and some pieces are chipping off. I do wash it faithfully everyday.
customer_reviews.author: edpv

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD GIVE THIS A 10 STAR RATING
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVE. Seriously everything about it was just bomb. The packaging came perfectly, it is soo soft on your skin and can be easily cleaned. If you soak it in water and squeeze the excess water out, it grows in size. Its SO GREAT. It applies your foundation and powder so smoothly as well
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Bae

customer_reviews.title: Not soft, soaked up makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender because I watched an influenster review about it. She claimed it was so soft and loved using it. I did not feel it was very soft. In fact, I had bought one at Target for a few dollars more that I felt was much more soft. I also highly disliked how it blended my makeup. I felt it soaked up a lot of foundation and it really didn't do a great job at application. I through this blender away about 2 weeks of having it and I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction Within Minutes
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin like I do (eczema), DONT buy this. I used it with my normal liquid foundation and within 5 minutes I was having an allergic reaction to it. My face was turning into a tomato and I quickly had to wash my makeup off and take allergy medication. I don’t know what is in this sponge that did this to me, but I won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Patton

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, holds a little too much product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good price when compared to the $20 beauty blender. It is NOT the same texture as the actual beauty blender product. Soaks up a little more product than I’d like, but for the price it works really well. Make sure you squeeze water out of it diligently because it retains a lot of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up product
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I LOVE this blender. It works great with my concealer-foundation combo. However, it soaks up so much product that you have to keep applying while using it. The price is right for the product you get. It is easy to clean and can be placed in your make up bag without fear that it's going to smear make up over everything
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ripped very fast.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else to complain other than it ripped few days of using. I heard about the brand from IPSY, but I did not check costumer review before buying it. I am disappointed hopefully the company can make some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are GAME CHANGERS!! They are pillowy soft and buoyant and blend my makeup (foundation, concealer, setting powder) seamlessly. And for $4 they are truly unbeatable. I buy all my makeup from Sephora and these blenders feel just as luxurious as the expensive blenders sold there. TRY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: KatherineV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender soooo much. I’ve never bought the true beauty blender from Sephora but with this I don’t feel like I need too. It washes super easy. I’m not experiencing the black dots that others have talked about. This is totally used for drag makeup so it’s about as durable as you can get. If it can handle this it can definitely handle the day wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: @thekhaliblaq

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this JUST to try it because of the reviews. I knew it wouldn’t work because of the price, or so I thought! This little sponge is just like the beauty blender only a fraction of the cost and a little bigger when wet.great quality too. It blends product really well. Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Aesthetica make sponge. Wash before use so you have a clean sponge let dry 48 hrs So it nice clean & dry. Very soft on your eyes & face. Easy to blend concealer under eyes, blend liquid foundation, or cream blush. Very durable yet soft. Very good buy. Thank you ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Irene Beltran  (SHE.nails)

customer_reviews.title: Quality for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome beauty blender! I use bb cream and this blender makes it so much more flawless. A huge plus, I have noticed my makeup stays put all day now! It used to settle into fine lines halfway through the day until now! Yay! I have sensitive combination skin, so after wetting the blender and squeezing it out, I spray a moisturizing facial spray on it and it is perfection on my combination skin. I love this beauty blender and will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Parris Marie

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Although I have only been using this item for a few days, I find it blends my makeup much better and faster than I was able to do manually. My skin actually looks smoother with no changes in the actual makeup, the only change is this sponge blender. Time will tell regarding its lifetime use. However for now I am 100% satisfied and would not hesitate to reorder this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: sensu01001101

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love
customer_reviews.text: I typically hate every beauty blender I try. They usually suck up my foundation, are never soft enough & never clean all the way, no matter how hard I try. This one is different. It doesn’t suck up my foundation, it is SO soft, and it cleans so easily. And it’s so inexpensive!! I’m never using a different sponge. This brand gained a customer for life
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a competitors sponge and I didn't like it because it ripped so easily, and I didn't really feel it blended my foundation into my skin very well. So, I was very skeptical about trying a different sponge. However, I noticed a beauty influencer that I watch regularly on YouTube use this sponge and she had great success with it, so I thought, why not? Not only did this sponge out blend the other sponge I had been using, it is much more durable and cleans up so much better. I'll definitely be back for more - thanks for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: I looked like crap today after I used this to blend my ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a sponge, and it does look to be appropriate size. But gosh, it really is cheap and poorly made. I looked like crap today after I used this to blend my foundation. I also had to use 2 pumps instead of 1 and I still had less coverage. I'm pretty certain it sucked up a bunch of the foundation. Lastly, I think it sucked up my day cream, because I felt very dry all day. I am rating this two stars, leaning toward one. I think my cats would find greater use from this as a cat toy bopping it around the bathroom floor, but they would probably eat it.
customer_reviews.author: PhysicsTime

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price! True when they say replace every 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised correctly, which is a rarity these days. This blender does everything the company says it does: effortlessly blends creams and liquids when wet, holds the moisture in and doesn’t absorb much product at all. It does wear out quickly, though. You truely have to replace it every 2-3 months (as advertised). I’ve been buying this blender for almost a full year now, it’s a staple item for me!! UPDATE: This most current sponge is a different material/feel than the previous ones from this company. They no longer break down into pieces like so many others have experienced with this product. I might even go as far as to say it’s bigger in size!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to beauty blender and real techniques sponge
customer_reviews.text: About the size of the beauty blender and comparable in use to one. Also comparable to the orange real techniques sponges, but costs less than either. I don't put on makeup very often so I can't speak to its durability. I do like that it's black, though!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this beauty blender when I am sent a good one. The first one I ordered was awesome. I loved it and my makeup looked really good. I ordered another one after a while and this one isn’t up to par. It’s very hard and when wet it’s still very stiff. I don’t like it at all, and will probably not order another cause two is the price of a regular beauty blender that everyone loves. Decent tho, so maybe buy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new blender and I am very happy with my purchase. First of all, it's black which is already amazing but secondly (& more importantly) I absolutely love how it blends my foundation making my skin and face look smooth and flawless thanks to a great job with my makeup application products. I would definitely purchase from this seller again as well as would definitely repurchase this particular blender again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Sponge is Not soft enough for me
customer_reviews.text: I find this sponge is not as soft as I like. I have tried the Ulta brand beauty sponge and it is also not soft for me. I use Real Techniques brand which is a soft sponge and makes application of my foundation easy. I believe this product was an “add on item” and inexpensive so I tried it but do not recommend if you like a soft beauty sponge to apply yr make up
customer_reviews.author: Debra Blenman

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the regular "Beauty Blender" for years. I love them. The issue is the price is so high. I have tried so many knock off brands and they're usually crawly. This one was not! They are soft, yet firm enough to blend. When I dampen it, it puffs up to regular size. It blends foundation incredibly well. Also works super well with powder products too!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystie milano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!!! they work GREAT, are soft, I have 0 complaints besides the fact my cat loves to tear these up :( Will be buying another once mine are....destroyed...again.. Thank you for making these cheap w/ great quality, for someone that has to keep re-buying often.
customer_reviews.author: Darian M

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original Beauty Blender in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Aesthetica Beauty Sponge, my previous one was loved (used) to death and it was time to replace. For any of you searching for a Beauty Blender dupe - this is the product for you. I have 3 different Beauty Blenders (various sizes) and to be totally honest I truly prefer this sponge to my pink Beauty Blender. They produce similar results but for some reason I just like this one better and the fact that it is less than half the price is just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best sponge ever
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best sponge I’ve ever owned ! I didn’t have high hopes due to the price but thought I’d give it a try ! You can tell it’s high quality once you get your hands on it ! Hope this helps! If so, please give me a thumbs up (:
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo I actually bought this randomly to test my new debit card if it was working lol & I’m so glad I did bc it’s a great sponge & decided to buy 2! Blends makeup perfectly, doesn’t soak up all my foundation. It’s nice & squishy when you wet it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: STINAXOXO

customer_reviews.title: Okay beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: This beauty blender does the job, but it is not quite as firm as I would like. I like some bounce but this one was almost squishy, even though I did a thorough job of squeezing all the water out. It also sometimes left tiny black bits on my face that shed while I was applying my foundation. I wouldn't get this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I'm super surprised that I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm super surprised that I like this product. I've used the real techniques sponge for 2 years now. I saw many youtubers saying that this was a great sponge so I decided to try it. I wish it was a lighter color but it works fantastic. I've never tried the original beauty blender but I have tried many terrible sponges from the drug store. Also, the best way to clean a makeup sponge is with a cheap bar of soap. I clean mine after every use & have wasted tons of money on fancy sponge/brush cleansers. Just get a bar of soap
customer_reviews.author: The_Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to loved the real technique sponges Until I found this !! Is sooo much better and is so easy to clean and when y clean it u can tell all the make up comes out. It doesnt stay in your sponge. When apply your make up like concealer or liquid foundation u can tell the difference. It looks soo much better !
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a finger or brush person. But I keep seeing everyone on tik tok using sponges so I bought one. I love this sponge. Being black it's easy to see the foundation.. super easy to clean. I will not be without this sponge from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mindie Sue Sposari

customer_reviews.title: The very berry best
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite blender! I’ve tried the colorful 5 pack (beakey I think) that everyone recommends and this one is WAY better. It works excellent when it’s damp and the others don’t. I was gung-ho on the morphe sponges and I actually like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jones

customer_reviews.title: If you are debating on buying, PLEASE DO
customer_reviews.text: I’ve slacked on my reviews lately, but I literally had to step away from my desk to make this one. Wow! This blender is AMAZING. I have bought so many of the $20 BB before and this one blows them all away. It is so soft and bouncy. I’ve only used it once and my foundation looks amazing today! So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara T.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Although I never tried the actual beauty blender but I have tried other beauty sponges such as the real techniques one and other off brand one...but THIS one! It's so soft and applied my foundation flawlessly...I didn't have any of the black fall out from the sponge like some people claimed they had...also when I first opened the package it was smaller than I thought but once wet it expanded to much bigger!!! I love this beauty sponge! Well worth it and it was a great price! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: How did I EVER do without this little beauty? SERIOUSLY 😆 I love it so much, it blends my favorite Glossier stretch concealer and cream blush so beautifully that I immediately bought a second one for myself and one for my friend 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kris Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good and my makeup looks a lot more natural when applying with this sponge.This one is a bit smaller than the ones I have seen before but I believe it might be a little better for adding concealer around the eyes. That's where I have to touch up all the time bc my eyes are a bit deep set and dark.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: This beauty sponge is awesome!! I’ve only ever used the BeautyBlender, but I was tired of how expensive they are. After reading all the positive reviews for this one I decided to give it a try. I mean it’s only 4$. I’m so happy I did....this sponge is waayyy better. It’s softer, almost velvety. It absorbs water a lot quicker, yet you can squeeze out more water. It’s slightly bigger than a BB, which I didn’t know I would enjoy, but I do. Overall, it’s fantastic. I’m curious to see how long it will last through use and cleanings. Super happy😄👍
customer_reviews.author: Elaine McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Your search ends here.
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions, which I never do. It said to wet the sponge a little so I did. What a difference!!! It blends so well and doesn’t leave me looking cakey. It makes anything look smooth and it still feels soft three weeks later. Don’t look any further, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Soft but firm
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing something like this. So it's hard to compare to others. The little "sponge" is super soft and easy to hold. I feel it absorbs too much of the products, that's why I gave it a 4 stars. BUT again, maybe all of these type of sponges do. I don't know. But I like it. I usually mostly close to my eyes, since it's so soft and yet firm.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, flawless finish
customer_reviews.text: This is my first beauty blender so I'm just starting to get the hang of it, but I really love how this applies, spreads and blends my makeup so smoothly. Much easier and softer application than a silicone pad or even my own fingers. I really see the difference in the finish. I do tend to use more foundation when using this blender than I did when using my fingers, however, again, the result is just so smooth and flawless. I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.author: MM717

customer_reviews.title: when my friend recommended this to me
customer_reviews.text: As a grad student in mountains of debt, I don't have the funds to buy the actual Beauty Blender. Therefore, when my friend recommended this to me, I tried it out immediately. Lo and behold, this Aesthetica Beauty Sponge Blender was perfect! The dye on the Beauty Blender used to come off whenever I washed it, which was alarming since I use it on my face, but this beauty sponge did not have this problem. It's perfect for blending out foundation and concealer (and probably other products like bronzer, etc.)! I highly recommend this sponge as a dupe for the Beauty Blender!
customer_reviews.author: Minji Kim

product_meta.title: Aesthetica Cosmetics Beauty Sponge Blender - Latex Free and Vegan Makeup Sponge - For Powder, Cream or Liquid Application - One Piece
feature_bullets: The Aesthetica Cosmetics Beauty Sponge is the only blending sponge applicator tool for powder, cream and liquid makeup you'll ever need. This makeup sponge provides a flawless, edge-less application to help you look your best, every day, and is perfect for contouring with the Aesthetica Cosmetics Cream Contour Kit.

The rounded end of the sponge is great for blending on the cheeks, while the precision of the sponge's tip makes covering minor imperfections easy. Use the flat edge around the nose and eyes for contouring, to get an enhanced, beautiful and smooth complexion that appears airbrushed flawless.

Made from non-latex foam to reduce allergies and 100% Vegan and Cruelty free. This makeup sponge is simple to use and easy to clean, making it a great choice from amateurs to pros. It's easy to optimize your beauty routine by using this multi-functional beauty sponge.

Edge-less design for maximum and seamless coverage. Can be used with foundation, cream blush, primers, powders and other makeup products. The Aesthetica Cosmetics Makeup Sponge is Easy to clean with mild soap and water.
Can be used wet or dry. Dab it gently in the makeup and bounce it along your skin for a natural, flawless look. Minimal absorption with maximum coverage and made to last!
